title: Doteraman
synopsis: In a small town of Tokyo there lives a middle-aged man, Suzuki, who spends commonplace days conducting a small business. He is ambitious to become such a celebrity as to appear on the cover page of a popular magazine.
characters: ['Nakamura, Mariko', 'Doteraman', 'Genki', 'Se Oni', 'Honshuu Riki', 'Furoshi Oni', 'Dotsu Oni', 'Time travel Oni', 'Inseki Oni', 'Tenkamute Oni']
voices: ['Koujiro, Chie', 'Tsukase, Noriko', 'Ono, Kenichi', 'Sakamoto, Chika', 'Ootaki, Shinya', 'Aomori, Shin', 'Tomita, Kousei', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Inoue, You', 'Shimaka, Yuu']
